text: Jonathan Coulton is an American alternative rock singer-songwriter. He is known for his songs about geek culture. His album Artificial Heart hit #1 on the Billboard Top Heatseeker Chart. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Smoking Monkey (2003) * Where Tradition Meets Tomorrow (2004) * Our Bodies, Ourselves, Our Cybernetic Arms (2005) * Thing a Week One (2006) * Thing a Week Two (2006) * Thing a Week Three (2006) * Thing a Week Four (2006) * Artificial Heart (2011) == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Alternative music
title: Jonathan Coulton
